/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/RPiFirmware.dir/src/drivers/Gpio.cpp.o CMakeFiles/RPiFirmware.dir/src/drivers/PushButton.cpp.o CMakeFiles/RPiFirmware.dir/src/drivers/Stepper.cpp.o CMakeFiles/RPiFirmware.dir/src/drivers/TcpServerAsync.cpp.o CMakeFiles/RPiFirmware.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o RPiFirmware -lpthread -lpigpio -lrt
